entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
